name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning
content: Paper Publication: 1\. PRML 2022 papers will be published in IEEE Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. 2\. Special Issue of Entropy (ISSN 1099-4300), (IF: 2.524, SCI index), indexed by Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), Inspec, EBSCO, etc.
